title: Custom Tools
lede: Create custom tools and integrations to extend your AI agent capabilities.

sections.title: Tool Development
sections.content:
Build custom tools that your AI agents can use during conversations.

Tool Types:

  • API Integrations: Connect to external REST APIs
  • Database Tools: Query and update databases
  • Calculation Tools: Perform complex calculations
  • Business Logic: Custom business rule processing

sections.title: Tool Management
sections.content:
Manage and deploy your custom tools across agents.

  • Code Editor: Built-in development environment
  • Testing Framework: Test tools before deployment
  • Version Control: Manage tool versions and updates
  • Library Management: Reusable tool components
